hints.content:
To find how many fewer flavors $\blueE{\text{Penguin's Treats}}$ has than $\purpleD{\text{Polar Bear Ice Cream}}$, we need the difference.  So, we subtract.

![](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/5887e4404f31227ed878129b6dfaa23fa438b32d)

$\purpleD{49} - \blueE{32} = \maroonD{\square}$

Let's subtract to find how many fewer flavors.

![](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/8b2cf25261dc89079077c525ff30f8e278d354d2)

$\purpleD{49} - \blueE{32} = \maroonD{17}$
Penguin's Treats has $\maroonD{17}$ fewer flavors than Polar Bear Ice Cream.

question.content:
Polar Bear Ice Cream has $49$ flavors of ice cream.  Penguin's Treats has $32$ flavors.  

**How many fewer flavors does Penguin's Treats have?** 
 
[[â˜ƒ numeric-input 1]] fewer flavors
